name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, ezcmac, zcross00, pwb, Thorfinn, DiamondMonster, FeralChicken, cryptfiend85, SoManyWhales, atticusonline, Afkpuz, jugglinfreak)

name: hipjiverobot
text: A comment left by hipjiverobot was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ShemmJacc, Thorfinn, Taidje_Khan, jugglinfreak, DerSquirrel)

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by love_is_so_punk, Hipjiverobot, 7th_shot, king_of_pwns, aHatOfPig, Ciansy, Doc_Rostov, apres, Satyr, tellumo)

name: love_is_so_punk
text: You know who else might do that?  Cajuns.

name: epicurus
text: Normally I'd agree with this, but Asherdan really is a special case (douchebag).

name: achilleselbow
text: The fact that people lamed this comment makes it even more so. It's ok, mashing the lame button is probably the only time in their lives they get to exercise any sort of power.

name: soticoto
text:
And amazingly enough... I didn't.
Must have been out of lames at the time.

name: maximum-can
text: Every time he makes such a post, someone feels the need to point it out.

name: dumase
text:
i like you asherdan. i like your adversity. you're just a guy trying to make things better. i respect that.
hopefully this chubby will help right the wrongs of my ancestors.

name: greenkoolayd
text: melungeon.

name: deimosrising
text: First Spongebath and Emeril appearance.

name: unsentletter
text:
Spongebath reminds me of the guitarist from the deftones .

Or, a fan of the band. This ain't a bad thing or a good thing in my opinion; I think it's just a thing.

I like Spongebath and Emeril.

name: goro
text:
Yeah, I can see that, and Stephen Carpenter is kind of a meaner, fatter, silent Bob, who looks like he does nothing else outside of playing guitar and inhaling burned marijuana.

I think it is rad to have a weed habit.

name: farqussus
text: heated-up marijuana. It's heated-up.

name: cracklewater
text:
When does Emeril become loquacious?

I read the GOF first, and at the end of that arc Emeril has a very high standard of diction when discussing the Fight's future.

Here, he's talkin' all Cajun. Did the change happen in the strip?

Apologies if the change occurs in this arc, and I only had to read a few more strips to find out...

name: laserblade
text: Nope, Onstad tweaked Emeril's character pretty substantially.  It happened with almost every character, but in 2002 and 2003 mostly.

name: dasilodavi
text: So, I guess Emeril is so named because he looks like Emeril Lagasse?  Or is that just a crazy coincidence?

name: sargasm
text: Spongebath communicates nonverbally, but only to Emeril.

name: mortshire
text: spongebath's goatee has a direct line of communication to emeril's right eyebrow.

name: woodenteeth
text: I do enjoy trying to think up a witty way of discussing your observations of a strip and then have someone burn you to the ground with the perfect retort. Oh... I mean "chubbied".

name: centipede_damascus
text: Emeril is from History!

name: joeyramoney
text: spongebath reminds me of the massive orange and green dot people from those ads for boost mobile.

name: overmedicated
text: He reminds me of Curious Orange.

name: riazm
text: Shit! Old School man! Old School! Time to youtube Curious Orange!

name: overmedicated
text: And not even a chubby for my trouble. Whatever happened to manners, doggs.

name: i_love_kate
text:
That is so old school I can't even remember the name of the show that he's from.

I do remember the cress sketches, though... good times.

name: overmedicated
text: Oh shit, that was a real arsehole move. Sorry mom, sorry dad, sorry college.

name: stuart
text: What do you call those hats like Spongebath wears?

name: oplem
text: fishermans caps

name: charchar
text: I named mine Wimmstein .

name: snowman
text: Bucket hats.

name: lazarusloafer
text: Is it just me, or are Emeril and Spongebath basically just a classier Jay and Silent Bob?

name: mikekitchell
text: A comment left by mikekitchell was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by professorhazard, machine13, TonyHighwind, saru, Setzkin, theplaidknight, achilleselbow, lazarusloafer, stormagnet)

name: professorhazard
text:
I was scrolling down here to make sure I would not be the second to make such a comment. I will, however, second your comment.

Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back shows that most towns have a duo in which one speaks in an odd manner and the other is largely silent. It therefore stands to reason that Emeril and Spongebath are, in fact, Achewood's weed connection.

The fact that Teodor buys from Little Nephew likely just means that L.N. is buying from these two and marking it up for suckers like T.

name: achilleselbow
text: Are you implying that Jay and Silent Bob are not classy?

name: lazarusloafer
text: No, only that they are less classy than Emeril and Spongebath.

name: tonyhighwind
text: Jay and Silent Bob are not classy, they are from New Jersey. This is, however, the reason they are awesome, because they are not classy and cold don't give a fuck about it.

name: pepperhittherim
text: Serious Times dogg

name: beansdooma
text: i not must integrate 'serious times' into my dialogue.

name: beansdooma
text: fuck i meant now. lame.

name: epicurus
text: "Serious times" is one that I really do use quite a bit, in cases where I would say either "Seriously!" for emphasis or when I would say "Really?" as a question.

name: jonnay
text: This comic deserves at least a 4, if only for the capitalization of "Condition."

name: drago25
text: These guys are awesome

name: ahatofpig
text: Isn't anyone else a little freaked out how Roast Beef is sitting in his room, hell of blinds pulled down?

name: snowman
text: It makes sense to me.

name: expellens
text: Foist appearance of Emeril Lagalegoland.  Sweet fancy Moses, and sweet congee!

name: mikeronomicon
text: Damn those guys are mean. And cool. I bet they smoke hella weed too.

name: jaldor
text: I just realized that it's presumably a nice day out if the cats are hanging outside, but Roast Beef is in a dark room with the shades pulled on account of his depression. Nice background detail.
